title: Tai Bwo Wannai Trio/Quick guide

properties.name: description
properties.value: Warning: Right-click all items during the quest as most of them are edible / destroyable. In addition the Tribesmen in and around Tai Bwo Wannai are aggressive and deal very high poison damage, easily lethal to lower level players.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Tai Bwo Wannai Trio/Quick guide
 This quick guide has an in-depth guide here.
It contains a more detailed description of dialogue, cutscenes, and storyline.

Details[edit | edit source]

Start point Talk to Timfraku in his house in Tai Bwo Wannai.
Official difficultyIntermediate
DescriptionIn Jungle Potion, the Shaman Trufitus communed with the gods to determine the fate of his people.

Now, Timfraku, the Chief of Tai Bwo Wannai, wishes to see his people and family return to the abandoned village.

Help a depressed fisherman, encourage a raging hunter and satiate an eccentric priest in this extreme test of aptitude and patience!
Official lengthMedium
Requirements
  • 15 Agility (boostable)
  • 30 Cooking (not boostable)
  • 5 Fishing (boostable) (65 if you wish to catch the Raw karambwan yourself)
  • Completion of Jungle Potion
Items required
  • Knife or bladed weapon, such as a Sword
  • Sliced banana (can be obtained during the quest)
  • Small fishing net
  • Pestle and mortar (can be obtained during the quest for 6 gp)
  • Iron spear or better. Do not work: Black spear, Leaf-bladed spear, and bone spear. (The spear will be lost as well.)
  • Agility potion(4)
  • Ranged or Magic equipment to kill a monkey for a monkey corpse
  • Tinderbox (If you wish to avoid running back to the range in Brimhaven)
  • Jogre bones (can be obtained during the quest)
  • Seaweed (can be obtained during the quest)
  • Karamjan rum or 30 coins to purchase (if obtaining the rum before starting, add the sliced banana or the rum will disappear when you leave the island)
Recommended
  • 30 Firemaking (not boostable) to make burnt jogre bones on a fire instead of at a furnace
  • Extra Raw karambwan in case you burn the one given to you by Tiadeche
  • Access to the Gnome Glider system (requires partial completion of The Grand Tree quest)
  • Rimmington or Ardougne teleport, as well as coins if you are chartering a ship to Brimhaven
  • Stamina potions
  • Food
  • Antidote++ or other Antipoisons
  • Amulet of glory
  • Brimhaven teleport
  • Weight-reducing clothing
  • Lunar/Dramen staff for fairy rings
  • 2 Logs to quickly make Poison karambwan at fishing site and to cook Pasty jogre bones later in the quest
  • 54 Agility, a mith grapple, and crossbow for the Strong Tree shortcut
Enemies to defeat
  • Monkey (level 3)
Ironman concerns
  • 34 Herblore (boostable) to create the agility potion.
  • 65 Fishing (boostable) to catch raw karambwan.(Necessary if you burn the one given to you)
  • The ability to defeat a level 53 enemy (can be safespotted and the bones telegrabbed at the Ardougne Zoo)
  • Obtaining an iron spear or better. May be bought from the Mount Karuulm Weapon Shop, or dropped by enemies such as Moss Giants, Jogres,Tribesmen, and Hobgoblins

May be bought from the [[Mount Karuulm Weapon Shop]], or dropped by enemies such as [[Moss Giant]]s, [[Jogres]],[[Tribesmen]], and [[Hobgoblins]]","items":"* [[Knife]] or bladed weapon, such as a [[Sword]]\n* [[Sliced banana]] (can be obtained during the quest)\n* [[Small fishing net]]\n* [[Pestle and mortar]] (can be obtained during the quest for 6 gp)\n* [[Iron spear]] or better. Do '''not''' work: [[Black spear]], [[Leaf-bladed spear]], and [[bone spear]]. (The spear will be lost as well.)\n* [[Agility potion|Agility potion(4)]]\n* [[Ranged]] or [[Magic]] [[equipment]] to kill a [[monkey]] for a [[monkey corpse]]\n* [[Tinderbox]] (If you wish to avoid running back to the range in Brimhaven)\n* [[Jogre bones]] (can be obtained during the quest)\n* [[Seaweed]] (can be obtained during the quest)\n* [[Karamjan rum]] or 30 coins to purchase (if obtaining the rum before starting, add the sliced banana or the rum will disappear when you leave the island)"}

Walkthrough[edit | edit source]

Warning: Right-click all items during the quest as most of them are edible / destroyable. In addition the Tribesmen in and around Tai Bwo Wannai are aggressive and deal very high poison damage, easily lethal to lower level players.

It is highly recommended to bring ALL quest items and teleports at the start.

Pre-quest preparation

Note: If you don't have 30 Firemaking, head to any furnace and use your jogre bones on it before starting the quest.

It is recommended for everyone to acquire a poison karambwan before starting the quest as well, just cook a raw karambwan on any fire or cooking utility.

With your poison karambwan, grind it with your pestle and mortar, then use the karambwan paste on your spear.

Tai Bwo Wannai Trio quest map.

Locations are referred to by their numbered index on the map to the right.

Banana rum[edit | edit source]

  • Travel to Musa Point using your amulet of glory to Karamja. (Pick a banana if you don't have one already.)
  • Run South into the pub, buy a Karamjan rum off Zambo for 30gp.
  • Use a knife on your banana, then right click the sliced banana and use it on your rum. (You can teleport safely with the mixed Rum.)

Starting out[edit | edit source]

  • Go towards the fairy ring CKR (south of Tai Bwo Wannai), then run north to the fishing spots.
  • Fish a raw karambwanji. (These are stackable; fish about 40 for the rest of the quest).
  • Use your pestle and mortar on the raw karambwanji.
  • Use a tinderbox on your jogre bones (unless you used them on a furnace earlier), and wait for the fire to burn out.
    • Some Jogre are east of Shilo village over a stepping stones shortcut.
  • Pick up the Burnt jogre bones and use your Karambwanji paste on them.
  • Light a fire with any logs and use the pasty jogre bones on the fire to get marinated j' bones. There are also 2 permanent fires south of Tai Bwo Wannai village.
  • Head north to Tai Bwo Wannai (or use a Brimhaven house teleport and run south if you have them)
  • Talk to Timfraku, who is located upstairs in the western hut north of Tai Bwo Wannai. ( 3•3)…
    3I am a wandering wayfarer.
    3Trufitus sent me.
    , wait, then ( 2•1)…
    2So far??
    1Yes
    .
  • Use a Brimhaven house teleport or teleport to ardougne and take the boat or simply run north to Lubufu by the fishing spots south of the Player Owned House Portal.
  • Talk to Lubufu. ( 1)…
    1I wasn't going anywhere...
  • Talk to Lubufu again. ( 1•3•2•3•1)…
    1Talk about him...
    3What do you do?
    2How old are you?
    3I could help collect the bait.
    1You sound like you could do with the help.
  • Talk to him again and give him 20 raw karambwanji.
  • Talk to him again. ( 3•2)…
    3What do you use to catch Karambwan?
    2What do you do with your Karambwan?
  • Wait, then accept his gift and learn how to fish Karambwan. ( 1)…
    1Yes!
  • Drop the karambwan vessel he gave you and get another ( 3•3)…
    3Actually, I've lost my Karambwan vessel.
    3... it floated away!
    , load it with a raw karambwanji then pick up the first one. You will need both the loaded and empty vessel.
    • Drop this vessel as well, and talk to Lufubu once more ( 3•3)…
      3Actually, I've lost my Karambwan vessel.
      3... it floated away!
      to obtain a vessel for use after the quest.

Helping the brothers[edit | edit source]

  • Head to DKP - it is south of Musa point.
  • Grab the seaweed nearby if you don't have one already
  • Talk to Tiadeche, who is directly north-east of the fairy ring DKP.
  • Use your loaded vessel on him and accept his gift. ( 1)…
    1Yes
  • Fish and cook karambwan (65 Fishing, or buy on GE) until you get a Poison karambwan. Use your Pestle and mortar on it to create poison Karambwan paste, then use that paste on your spear to make a Spear(kp).
  • Use the fairy ring right next to you and use the code CKR - it's north-west of Shilo village, south of the lake between Shilo village and Tai Bwo Wannai village.
  • Run north-east to the mine. Talk to Tamayu twice ( 3•1)…
    3When will you succeed?
    1Yes
    and watch a cutscene.
  • Right click and use your Agility potion (4 dose) and Spear (kp) on him - make sure he takes both.
  • Talk to him again ( 3)…
    3Take me on your next hunt for the Shaikahan.
    , watch the cutscene. Make sure he kills the beast or you won't finish the quest,
  • Kill a monkey in this area with magic or ranged, take its corpse.
  • Use the corpse on Tamayu.
  • Use your seaweed on the monkey skin to get a seaweed sandwich.
  • Either run south-west or use another fairy ring teleport to go back to CKR.
  • Climb up the hill and cross the bridge onto Cairn Isle, WALK across the bridge.
  • Talk to Tinsay and hand him all the food he requests ( 1)…
    1Yes.
    whenever prompted.
  • After handing him the marinated j' bones, use your empty (or filled) karambwan vessel on him and you'll receive a crafting manual.
  • Head to fairy ring DKP.
  • Talk to Tiadeche, use your manual on him and he will agree to go back to the village (but he'll stay for now).

Finishing up[edit | edit source]

  • Either use a Brimhaven House teleport, fairy ring CKR or simply walk back to the quest start.
  • Talk to Timfraku ( 1)…
    1Oh it was nothing really.
    and finish the quest.
  • (Optional)Before leaving talk to Tinsay for the ability to catch and cook karambwans.
  • (Optional)Before leaving talk to Tamayu to receive a karambwan-poisoned rune spear. Note: You will gain combat experience.
  • Quest complete!

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • 2 Quest points
  • 5,000 Cooking experience
  • 5,000 Fishing experience
  • 2,500 Attack experience
  • 2,500 Strength experience
  • 2,000 Coins
  • A karambwan-poisoned rune spear from talking to Tamayu in the village after the quest. Note: you will also receive combat experience.
  • Access to Tamayu's Spear Stall (sells cleaning cloths).
  • Access to Tiadeche's Karambwan Stall (sells raw karambwans and karambwan vessels).
  • The ability to pray at the newly repaired tribal statue (works like an altar) from talking to Tinsay and Tiadeche in the village after the quest.
  • The ability to catch and cook karambwans from talking to Tinsay in the village after the quest.
  • The ability to fight the Shaikahan (level 83 - you need a kp spear to hit it).
  • The ability to use Tai bwo wannai teleport scrolls.
  • You can also take part in the Smithing section of Otto's Barbarian Training.
v • d • e

rawContent:
{{external|rs}}
{{Quick Guide}}

==Details==
{{Quest details page|Tai Bwo Wannai Trio}}

==Walkthrough==
'''{{Colour|Red|Warning}}: Right-click all items during the quest as most of them are edible / destroyable. In addition the [[Tribesmen]] in and around [[Tai Bwo Wannai]] are aggressive and deal very high poison damage, easily lethal to lower level players.'''

'''It is highly recommended to bring ALL quest items and teleports at the start.'''

'''Pre-quest preparation'''

Note: If you don't have 30 [[Firemaking]], head to any furnace and use your [[jogre bones]] on it before starting the quest.

It is recommended for everyone to acquire a [[poison karambwan]] before starting the quest as well, just cook a [[raw karambwan]] on any fire or [[cooking]] utility.

With your poison karambwan, grind it with your [[pestle and mortar]], then use the [[karambwan paste]] on your spear.

[[File:Tai Bwo Wannai Trio Quest Map.png|thumb|Tai Bwo Wannai Trio quest map.]]
Locations are referred to by their numbered index on the map to the right.

===Banana rum===
{{Checklist|
*Travel to [[Musa Point]] using your amulet of glory to Karamja. (Pick a banana if you don't have one already.)
*Run South into the pub, buy a Karamjan rum off Zambo for 30gp.
*Use a knife on your banana, then right click the [[sliced banana]] and use it on your rum. (You can teleport safely with the mixed Rum.)
}}
===Starting out===
{{Checklist|
*Go towards the [[fairy ring]] {{Fairycode|CKR}} (south of [[Tai Bwo Wannai]]), then run north to the [[fishing spots]].
*Fish a [[raw karambwanji]]. (These are stackable; fish about 40 for the rest of the quest).
*Use your pestle and mortar on the raw karambwanji.
*Use a tinderbox on your [[jogre bones]] (unless you used them on a furnace earlier), and wait for the fire to burn out.
**Some Jogre are east of Shilo village over a [[Stepping stones (Karamja)|stepping stones]] [[shortcut]].
*Pick up the [[Burnt jogre bones]] and use your [[Karambwanji paste]] on them.
*Light a fire with any logs and use the [[pasty jogre bones]] on the fire to get [[marinated j' bones]]. There are also 2 permanent fires south of Tai Bwo Wannai village.
*Head north to Tai Bwo Wannai (or use a Brimhaven house teleport and run south if you have them)
*Talk to [[Timfraku]], who is located upstairs in the western hut north of Tai Bwo Wannai. {{Chat option|3I am a wandering wayfarer.|3Trufitus sent me.}}, wait, then {{Chat option|2So far??|1Yes}}.
*Use a Brimhaven house teleport or teleport to ardougne and take the boat or simply run north to [[Lubufu]] by the fishing spots south of the Player Owned House Portal.
*Talk to Lubufu. {{Chat option|1I wasn't going anywhere...}}
*Talk to Lubufu again. {{Chat option|1Talk about him...|3What do you do?|2How old are you?|3I could help collect the bait.|1You sound like you could do with the help.}}
*Talk to him again and give him 20 raw karambwanji.
*Talk to him again. {{Chat option|3What do you use to catch Karambwan?|2What do you do with your Karambwan?}}
*Wait, then accept his gift and learn how to fish Karambwan. {{Chat option|1Yes!}}
*Drop the karambwan vessel he gave you and get another {{Chat option|3Actually, I've lost my Karambwan vessel.|3... it floated away!}}, load it with a raw karambwanji then pick up the first one. You will need both the loaded and empty vessel.
**Drop this vessel as well, and talk to Lufubu once more {{Chat option|3Actually, I've lost my Karambwan vessel.|3... it floated away!}} to obtain a vessel for use after the quest.
}}
===Helping the brothers===
{{Checklist|
*Head to {{Fairycode|DKP}} - it is south of Musa point.
*Grab the [[seaweed]] nearby if you don't have one already
*Talk to [[Tiadeche]], who is directly north-east of the fairy ring {{Fairycode|DKP}}.
*Use your '''loaded vessel''' on him and accept his gift. {{Chat option|1Yes}}
*Fish and cook karambwan (65 Fishing, or buy on GE) until you get a Poison karambwan. Use your Pestle and mortar on it to create poison Karambwan paste, then use that paste on your spear to make a Spear(kp).
*Use the fairy ring right next to you and use the code {{Fairycode|CKR}} - it's north-west of Shilo village, south of the lake between Shilo village and Tai Bwo Wannai village.
*Run north-east to the mine. Talk to [[Tamayu]] twice {{Chat option|3When will you succeed?|1Yes}} and watch a cutscene.
*Right click and use your '''Agility potion (4 dose)''' and '''Spear (kp)''' on him - '''make sure he takes both'''.
*Talk to him again {{Chat option|3Take me on your next hunt for the Shaikahan.}}, watch the cutscene. Make sure he kills the beast or you won't finish the quest,
*Kill a monkey in this area with magic or ranged, take its corpse.
*Use the corpse on Tamayu.
*Use your seaweed on the monkey skin to get a seaweed sandwich.
*Either run south-west or use another fairy ring teleport to go back to {{Fairycode|CKR}}.
*Climb up the hill and cross the bridge onto [[Cairn Isle]], WALK across the bridge.
*Talk to [[Tinsay]] and hand him all the food he requests {{Chat option|1Yes.}} whenever prompted.
*After handing him the [[marinated j' bones]], use your empty (or filled) [[karambwan vessel]] on him and you'll receive a [[crafting manual]].
*Head to fairy ring {{Fairycode|DKP}}.
*Talk to Tiadeche, use your manual on him and he will agree to go back to the village (but he'll stay for now).
}}
===Finishing up===
{{Checklist|
*Either use a Brimhaven House teleport, fairy ring {{Fairycode|CKR}} or simply walk back to the quest start.
*Talk to Timfraku {{Chat option|1Oh it was nothing really.}} and finish the quest.
*(Optional)Before leaving talk to Tinsay for the ability to catch and cook karambwans.
*(Optional)Before leaving talk to Tamayu to receive a karambwan-poisoned rune spear. Note: You will gain combat experience.}}
*Quest complete!

==Rewards==
{{Quest rewards page|Tai Bwo Wannai Trio}}
